content: westward mitts are the third pattern in my westward knit collection collection includes the westward cowl 1 the westward hat 2 and these mitts the westward mitts yarn approximately 136 yards / 124 m of chunky weight yarn shown in o-wool o-wash chunky 100% machine-washable certified organic merino 122 yards / 111 m per 100g skein slate color needles us #9 / 5 5mm 16 in / 40 cm circular or double point needle or size needed to obtain gauge gauge 18 stitches / 20 row = 4 in / 10 cm in cable pattern blocked size and dimension medium to fit palm circumference 7 5 in / 19 cm and 11 25 in / 28 5 cm long blocked notions removable stitch markers tapestry needle cable needle waste yarn 1 https //www ravelry com/patterns/library/westward-cowl 2 https //www ravelry com/patterns/library/westward-hat
